1.0.name: wordpress/subscribe-remind
1.0.description: With the Subscribe-Remind plugin, some text will automatically be placed at the end of each of your posts inviting your readers to subscribe to your RSS feed or follow you on Twitter. It's an unobtrusive and effective way to turn visitors into subscribers.
